mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Side by Side", "Alamo Rollaway", "Bell Bottom Trousers", and "Missing Link". ROUND DANCES "Candlelight Waltz", and "Stumbling". SPECIAL FEATURES "Summer is Institute Time", "Second Annual National Convention", "Juniors Sashay in Surrey", "Callers, Callers, Everywhere", "Chicago Shares Dancing Fun", "New Life for Minnesota Club", and "June at Asilomar". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "Women on the Square", "Square of the Month", "'Round the Outside Ring", "Green Sheet", "From the Floor", "Calendar of Square Dancing Events", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
